wikipedia_page.main:
Sir Edwin Forsyth Stockton was Conservative MP for Manchester Exchange (UK Parliament constituency).
He won the seat in 1922, but lost it to the Liberals in 1923.

link_mentions.page: List of MPs elected in the 1922 United Kingdom general election
List of United Kingdom MPs who only sat in the 32nd Parliament

response: Barclay first stood for Parliament at the 1923 general election. In a straight fight in the Manchester Exchange constituency he defeated the sitting Conservative MP, Sir Edwin Stockton by a majority of 1,799 votes.F W S Craig, British Parliamentary Election Results 1918-1949; Political Reference Publications, Glasgow, 1949 p187
